description:
Daisy`s Dewgong made its first and only appearance in the episode The Misty Mermaid. It was in an underwater ballet written by Violet, one of Misty`s three sisters.
After successfully attacking Jessie`s Arbok, it evolved and afterwhich froze Team Rocket with its Ice Beam attack. In the end, the show was saved by Daisy`s Dewgong. Unfortunately it hasn`t been seen since and most likely remains at the Cerulean City gym.
name: Jugon (Sakura)
